statements: SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule
SELECT provider_name, schedule_date, time_slot FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule WHERE availability = true
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, schedule_date, time_slot FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, time_slot ASC
SELECT provider_name FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule WHERE provider_id = 1 AND schedule_date = '2022-09-15'
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30'
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, time_slot ASC, provider_name;
SELECT provider_name, schedule_date, time_slot FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule WHERE provider_id = 1 AND availability = TRUE;
SELECT provider_name, schedule_date, time_slot FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule WHERE availability = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_name FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule;
SELECT provider_id, schedule_date, COUNT(*) AS appointments_count FROM Healthcare_Provider_Schedule GROUP BY provider_id, schedule_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY appointments_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM providers;
SELECT name, specialty FROM providers WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, specialty, availability FROM providers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT id, date, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT name, availability FROM providers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name, s.date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM providers p INNER JOIN schedules s ON p.id = s.provider_id WHERE s.status = 'Booked';
SELECT p.name, COUNT(*) AS num_appointments FROM providers p INNER JOIN schedules s ON p.id = s.provider_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING num_appointments > 5;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date >= '2022-12-01' AND date <= '2023-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers ORDER BY specialty;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Records WHERE patient_diagnosis = 'Heart Disease';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, availability_timeslot FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE specialty = 'Pediatrics';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE availability_timeslot >= '08:00:00';
SELECT provider_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Healthcare_Providers INNER JOIN Appointments ON Healthcare_Providers.healthcare_provider_id = Appointments.healthcare_provider_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Records ORDER BY patient_name DESC;

SELECT provider_name, specialty, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Healthcare_Providers INNER JOIN Appointments ON Healthcare_Providers.healthcare_provider_id = Appointments.healthcare_provider_id GROUP BY provider_name, specialty;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, availability FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, appointment_date FROM healthcare_providers INNER JOIN appointments ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id WHERE appointments.status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE availability = true;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, availability FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND availability = true;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM provider_schedule ORDER BY date, start_time DESC;
SELECT provider_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM provider_schedule WHERE provider_id = 5;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM provider ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment WHERE is_confirmed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM availability WHERE is_available = FALSE ORDER BY date ASC, provider_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM provider_schedule WHERE provider_id = 1
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, appointment_date FROM appointment ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT provider_name, location FROM provider WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND location = 'New York'
SELECT date, AVG(start_time) AS avg_start_time FROM provider_schedule GROUP BY date
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patient WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01'
